mapper.select:
SELECT COUNT(*) registerUserNum,#{startDate} startDate,#{endDate} endDate,#{userSource} userSource FROM CHINALIFEEC.GE_USER_PERSONAL WHERE USERSOURCE = #{userSource} AND
makedate >= TO_DATE(concat(#{startDate},' 00:00:00'),'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss')
and makedate <= TO_DATE(concat(#{endDate},' 23:59:59'),'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss')
